pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generating Funky Heatmaps for Data Frames // Allows generating heatmap-like visualisations for benchmark data frames. Funky heatmaps can be fine-tuned by providing annotations of the columns and rows, which allows assigning multiple palettes or geometries or grouping rows and columns together in categories. Saelens et al. (2019) doi:10.1038/s41587-019-0071-9.
